name: Combination Puzzle Game
description:
~HOW TO PLAY ~

 Each row of symbols in the matrix represents a number, and adds up across and down in a straight line. The symbols values change each round.  Each symbols value will be from 1 - 10.  Find out what '?' equals.

Press Up Arrow or Tap Top of screen to raise number.

 Press Down Arrow or Tap Near Bottom of screen to lower number.

 Press Enter or Tap the Left side of screen to check number.

For downloaded game-

To play downloaded file simple open with internet browser on any device and if you see nothing enable JavaScript. Works offline and you can use the source code for your games! To edit open with any text editor.

Made with Marshmellow Cat.

https://succeedinglightssoftware.itch.io/marshmellow-cat-a-javascript-framework

enjoy !!
